https://store.steampowered.com/app/1351950/Projectile_Dysfunction/

'Splosions!  And floppy physics cause it's funny!   I'd even wonder a bit of this is the other game IG is secretly working on, but there's no Kerbals and it only costs $3.99 in EA, so it's definitely not them
Thread moved to the off topic Lounge, since it's not about KSP.

KSP with PipBoy-K000 and FusRoDah engines.

Dwemer SAS from Draconic Griffonic Electronics.

And extraterrestrial moons, full of clips for Desert Keagle.

Already saw some guy make silly tanks that can shoot in KSP2. 

I think with our modding community its gonna be possible to  make you're Kerbals shoot each other with firearms
